name: Nuclear Beer Factory: Will it explode? Should not
name_original: Nuclear Beer Factory: Will it explode? Should not
description:
In Nuclear Beer Factory, you have to take on the role of a space brewer, running a high-quality Star Beer factory. But the process is not as simple as it might seem, production is extremely dangerous and in case of inept use of resources, you risk flying up into the air ... being wiped off the face of the earth ... turning into cosmic dust! Fortunately for you, the prudent creators have left detailed instructions for survival ... for using this creep of engineering.

# Goal

Do not explode. You will explode if you energy tank will overflow by 50 units or run out.

# How?

  1. Fill up the tank with uranium
  2. Fill silo with sanks of strange things
  3. Throw 7 bottle in rocket
  4. Recive 5$ and buy another sank and uranium
  5. Repeat

And so, now you know how the factory works and ready to start working. Most importantly, always remember the motto and also the main rule: Nuclear Beer Factory: Will it explode? Should not.

# Known bugs:

  • Black image on map
  • Strage physics
  • Strage economy
  • HUD was not completed (overflow counter, battery, arrow)
